summary: This is an email exchange between a Southern District of New York (SDNY) attorney and attorney Brad Edwards regarding an upcoming July 14, 2020 court hearing. The email forwards a scheduling order with dial-in instructions for an audio feed and mentions the need to know if victims wish to exercise their right to be heard.

persons.name: Brad Edwards
persons.context: Attorney for victims, recipient of email regarding court hearing arrangements and victim participation.

events.title: Court Hearing
events.description: A court hearing is scheduled. The scheduling order contains dial-in instructions for an audio feed and information about an overflow room for a video feed.

keyFacts: A court hearing was scheduled for July 14, 2020.
The court issued a scheduling order with dial-in instructions for an audio feed of the conference.
The email discusses the need to know if victims wish to exercise their right to be heard at the hearing.
The correspondence is from the States Attorney for the Southern District of New York to attorney Brad Edwards.
